title: Stupid Avast blocking lollauncher.exe from starting
body: Avast blocked the launcher and now I can't get league to work now...

replies.body:
Actually you can just remove it from your vault and add it to a exception all at once without a reinstall.

Right Click avast icon in your system tray and select virus chest.
find the lolLauncher.exe and Right click, restore and add exception

then your all good, might have to restart tho.

Just had this issue like 5 minutes ago and its a lot simpler than reinstalling the whole game if your internet is crappy

I made a quick post for a step by step guide if this is not clear enough for some users.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/UXnW6af0-league-launcher-reported-by-avast-fix-2122016

Thanks for catching this and setting up this guide, Mike, and thanks for reporting it Sona.

A few of us are working on making sure this won't happen again.

EDIT: Not 100% sure about the behavior of the issue, so redacted. I'll make sure to find someone who does understand the behavior better and can keep it from happening.

Your welcome, just trying to help other out when i can :) being a IT Tech helps sometimes :) hopefully it gets a quick fix for those not aware of the forum. I also made one in the help and support tab just in case its not being seen for some users.
This has been verified and submitted to Avast for whitelisting. I have no ETA on it being implemented, though.
Just wanted to let you know apparently they must still be working on it because it just happened to me. Annoying AF
Okay ill go ahead and quote this to my guide for everyone to see :) Thanks for your help :)
Yea had the same issue and removing it from the chest worked. Weird that Avast has never done this before. Don't think there was an update or anything.
